creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: four large black characters in a rather dry-brush style; small, thin characters at L; two seals at L in red, one at R; light mottled pastel-colored ground
markings: at top edge on back, on label: [(untranslated inscription) Lampo Leong (Lanbo Liang), \"Spiritual Forge\", 26\" x 45\", 2002, Ink and color on paper]
medium: Ink and color on rice paper
title: Spiritual Forge
